message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase my product.  It's worth a significant amount to me, so I'm asking for $1,300,000.  I believe this price reflects the value you'll derive from it.
Thank you for considering my request, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $1,100,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,100,000 is simply too low for me.  However, I'm willing to be flexible. I'm prepared to accept $1,200,000. This reflects a significant compromise on my end, and I hope we can reach an agreement.
I understand your position, Alice. I've reviewed my budget again, and I'm comfortable offering $1,150,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your continued interest. While your offer is closer, $1,150,000 is still below my minimum.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,225,000. This represents a considerable concession, and I hope we can finalize this deal.
Alice, I've considered your proposal carefully. I'm willing to increase my offer to $1,175,000 for the product. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
Bob, I'm beginning to run out of time. I'm willing to make one final concession. I'm prepared to accept $1,200,000. This is my absolute bottom line.  Let's close this deal.
